The {{Lang|'''Yougou Tengu'''|ja=影向天狗|ja_rm=Yougou Tengu}} are a group of [[tengu]] related to [[Mt. Yougou]]. They created the [[Empty Boat of a Thousand Gates]] at the end of the [[Araumi]] underground labyrinth, which housed the "[[Yougou Three]]."

==Overview==
The Yougou Tengu appear to be an elite group of the [[Tengu]] species, responsible for protecting [[Mt. Yougou]] and consequently, the [[Grand Narukami Shrine]] that sits upon it.

==Known Members==
===500 years ago===
*The "Great Tengu" [[Reizenbou]]
*[[Teruyo]]
